Body.Content:
We are announcing the Create and publish UI elements collections in desktop flows feature. This feature allows you to create, share, and import collections of UI elements in Power Automate desktop flows. This feature will reach general availability on September 30, 2024.

How does this affect me?
This feature will allow you to utilize a collection of UI elements with centralized oversight and control. These UI elements collections can be shared among users and integrated into various desktop flows as reusable modules. This feature allows updates to the UI elements collection to propagate to all desktop flows linked to the collection within the same environment.

What do I need to do to prepare?
This message is for awareness and no action is required.

For more information on this feature, please visit Create and publish UI elements collections in desktop flows.

Title: Power Automate â€“ Create and publish UI elements collections in desktop flows announcement
